page.title: 12LIFE ON SUNDAY
page.content: On Sunday if it is a rainy day I stay in bed until {9:00}am,where as on the other hand my mum and dad stay in bed until {11:00}am any weather.Usually in the morning I go for a quick bike ride around {CASTLE DRIVE},Along the sea front and back home again.When I get home my dad asks what the tide is like .If I say"The tide is low"we would probably go canoeing down { {GREEN BANK}.If the tide is high we would probably go down to the {MARINA} at the bottom of {OLD HILL},which is where our TENDER is kept and we row out and go sailing forthe day.When we finish sailing ,if the tide is too low to get on our mooring we putit on the pontoons on{CUSTOMS HOUSE QUAY}and pick it up in the morning .
